CustomField.formula: ( TEXT(StageName) = "Qualified" || TEXT(StageName) = "Trial" || TEXT(StageName) = "Proposal" || TEXT(StageName) = "Decision" || TEXT(StageName) = "Purchase" || TEXT(StageName) = "Closing" || TEXT(StageName) = "Orders Processing" || TEXT(StageName) = "Ready to Ship" ) && MONTH(CloseDate) = MONTH(TODAY())
CustomField.label: CML/ADR Tabs: Active Pipeline
